briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of FIAsp Compared to Insulin Aspart Both in Combination With Insulin Detemir in Adults With Type 1 Diabetes
officialTitle: Efficacy and Safety of FIAsp Compared to Insulin Aspart Both in Combination With Insulin Detemir in Adults With Type 1 Diabetes

arms.label: Meal time FIAsp and insulin detemir
Meal time insulin aspart and insulin detemir
Post meal FIAsp and insulin detemir

summary: This trial is conducted in Europe and the United States of America (USA). The aim of the trial is to investigate efficacy and safety of FIAsp (faster-acting insulin aspart) compared to insulin aspart, both in combination with insulin detemir in adults with type 1 diabetes. This trial consists of two periods: a 26 week treatment period followed by a 26 week additional treatment period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HbA1c (Glycosylated Haemoglobin)
